text: Namichi sun deebisee gara balbala mana qulqullummaatti na fide; anis bishaan gulantaa mana qulqullummaa jalaa baʼee gara baʼa biiftuutti yaaʼu nan arge; manni qulqullummaa sun gara baʼa biiftuutti garagala tureetii. Bishaan sunis kibba mana qulqullummaa jalaa baʼee kibba iddoo aarsaatiin gad yaaʼa ture.
